title: Alastair Campbell – 2022 Comments on a Liz Truss Resignation Honours List
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Alastair Campbell, the former Director of Communications, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
Neither she [Liz Truss] nor Johnson should be allowed a resignation honours list. They have no honour. They have disgraced and debased an office they should never have held.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
